citations.narrative:
In the enclosure on the left side of the barn, housing 32 sheep, there are several exposed screws and a broken wooden
fence board. At most of the vertical wooden boards, there are multiple screws that are exposed at varying lengths from
0.25 to 0.5 inch.
Failure to maintain enclosure fencing can allow for sharp points or unstable structures which can result in injury or
entrapment of the animals.
Facilities shall be maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury and contain them.
Correct by: March 15, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
In the enclosure on the left side of the barn, housing 32 sheep, there are several exposed screws and a broken wooden 
fence board.  At most of the vertical wooden boards, there are multiple screws that are exposed at varying lengths from 
0.25 to 0.5 inch.   
Failure to maintain enclosure fencing can allow for sharp points or unstable structures which can result in injury or 
entrapment of the animals. 
Facilities shall be maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury and contain them. 
Correct by: March 15, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End Section
